item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2010/02/19/php-helpers-make_slug/#comment-3245">Thomas Scholz</a>.
Good idea, I'll look at adding that.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Thomas Scholz.

Good idea, I’ll look at adding that.

item.title: By: Thomas Scholz
item.dc:creator: Thomas Scholz
item.description: I strongly suggest to use iconv() with the translit option before you drop all non-ASCII chars. Otherwise ›Übersicht‹ will result in ›bersicht‹.
item.content:encoded: I strongly suggest to use iconv() with the translit option before you drop all non-ASCII chars. Otherwise ›Übersicht‹ will result in ›bersicht‹.
